Monitor.Name: MSI Optix AG32C 31.5" Curved LED Gaming Monitor
Monitor.Description: MSI is one of the top brands for manufacturing top quality gaming monitors. Immerse into a virtual world of gaming with this beautiful monitor.

Monitor.Name: Asus VC279H Slim Bezel Black 27" LCD Monitor
Monitor.Description: VC279H Wall Mountable Frame-less Monitor In-Plane Switching technology panel with LED backlight in frameless & Slim design Advanced eye care feature with Blue Light Filter & Flicker free Embedded wall mount hole for multiple using scenario
Monitor.speaker: Built-in Stereo Speakers

Monitor.Name: Samsung SyncMaster 793S 17" CRT Monitor
Monitor.Description: The Samsung 793S is a conventional flat screen monitor (not the true flat type) with a 16" viewable screen area.

Mouse.Name: Rosewill NEON M59 RGB Gaming Mouse
Mouse.Description: This mouse aims to deliver the best gaming experience with the option to set the DPI level up to 10000, so you can focus on the action and enjoy the thrill and excitement with every move.

Mouse.Name: Logitech M510 Wireless Laser Mouse
Mouse.Description: The Logitech M510 Wireless Mouse delivers wireless convenience, comfort, and control you need to do more.

Mouse.Name: Microsoft 900 PW4-00001 Normal Mouse
Mouse.Description: This full-size mouse is designed for greater comfort and precise navigation and has an amazing 2-year average battery life.

Keyboard.Name: Logitech G810 Orion Spectrum
Keyboard.Description: Incorporating pure performance-driven design with Logitech’s most powerful technologies, the Logitech G810 is born to be a gaming weapon for hardcore gamers worldwide.

Keyboard.Name: Corsair Gaming K55
Keyboard.Description: Intuitive RGB backlighting modes, 6 dedicated macro keys, multi-key anti-ghosting and media controls provide the customization and control essential for victory. The K55 RGB is your first step towards enhanced performance.

Keyboard.Name: Razer BlackWidow Stealth 2016
Keyboard.Description: Designed specifically for gaming, Razer Mechanical Switches actuate at an optimal distance, giving you speed and responsiveness like never before.

HDD:Hard_Disk.HDD:Name: WD Blue 1TB Desktop Hard Disk Drive
HDD:Hard_Disk.HDD:Description: Boost your PC storage with WD Blue drives, the brand designed just for desktop and all-in-one PCs with a variety of storage capacities.

SSD:Hard_Disk.SSD:Name: SAMSUNG 860 EVO Series 500GB Internal Solid State Drive
SSD:Hard_Disk.SSD:Description: The newest edition to the world's best-selling1 SATA SSD series, the Samsung 860 EVO is specially designed to enhance performance of mainstream PCs and laptops.

SSD:Hard_Disk.SSD:Name: Intel 512GB SATA Internal Solid State Drive
SSD:Hard_Disk.SSD:Description: For those who demand value and performance, the new Intel® SSD, featuring 64-layer Intel® 3D NAND technology, offers a cost-effective and efficient replacement for traditional hard disk drives (HDD).

Speaker.Name: Creative GigaWorks T20 Series II
Speaker.Description: High style meets high fidelity with Creative's GigaWorks T20 Series II 2.0 speakers. Following its award-winning predecessor, this new two-piece system, finished in stylish high-glossy black coating, has been carefully enhanced to improve its visual appeal and acoustic capability, propelling your audio enjoyment to a whole new level.

Speaker.Name: Logitech Multimedia Speakers Z200
Speaker.Description: With two drivers per satellite delivering 10 watts of peak power, Z200 Multimedia Speakers produce rich, balanced stereo and clear acoustics for a room-filling sound.

Speaker.Name: Rosewill BA-001 2.1 Multimedia speaker system
Speaker.Description: Two satellite speakers with precise sound positioning and a 3 inch subwoofer recreate realistic entertainment. Immerse yourself in gameplay and movies with accurate sounds accompanied by deep, solid bass.

CPU.speaker: SP102
CPU.Name: Corsair One Pro Compact VR-Ready
CPU.Description: CORSAIR ONE takes fast, quiet, small, and beautiful PCs to a previously impossible level. Packed with cutting edge and award-winning CORSAIR technology, the CORSAIR ONE is designed specifically to deliver true VR and 4K gaming to your living room or den.

CPU.speaker: SP103
CPU.Name: Dell XPS Tower Special Edition (8930)
CPU.Description: Our highest performing XPS ever with 8th gen 6-core processors, advanced VR-ready graphics and easy to expand chassis. Now fully configurable.

CPU.speaker: SP101
CPU.Name: Alienware Area-51 Threadripper Edition
CPU.Description: The Alienware Area-51 desktop is re-engineered with Ryzen Threadripper processors, a 2nd gen triad chassis and optional dual Radeon® RX Vega64 graphics cards.

GPU.Name: PowerColor RED DRAGON Radeon RX 580
GPU.Description: It is based on AMD’s latest GCN 4 architecture designed for GloFo 14nm FinFET that delivers premium VR capability, increased level of performance, smooth VR, seamless support for next-gen gaming monitors and CPU-free game streaming or recording.

GPU.Name: SAPPHIRE NITRO+ Radeon RX 580
GPU.Description: Built on the future-proof Polaris architecture, the SAPPHIRE NITRO+ Radeon™ RX 580 graphics card plays your favorites at a smooth 1080p and beyond.

GPU.Name: MSI GeForce GTX 1060 Gaming X 6G
GPU.Description: GeForce GTX graphics cards are the most advanced ever created. Discover unprecedented performance, power efficiency, and next-generation gaming experiences.

Motherboard.Name: GIGABYTE GA-H110-D3A
Motherboard.Description: GIGABYTE 100 series motherboards support the latest 7th Generation Intel® Core™ processors, a 14nm desktop CPU which features improved performance, power efficiency and support for DDR4 memory, bringing cutting edge features and ultimate performance to your next PC build.

Motherboard.Name: MSI Z370 GAMING PLUS
Motherboard.Description: Personalize your PC with 16.8 million colors and 17 effects through Mystic Light RGB LED. Controlled in one click with the Mystic Light APP or a mobile device.

Motherboard.Name: ASRock B250 Pro4
Motherboard.Description: Prepare yourself well to enjoy the impressive world of Virtual Reality. Before that, you have to make sure everything is qualified, including hardware, software and drivers.

Processor.Name: Intel Core i5-7600K Kaby Lake
Processor.Description: 7th Generation Intel® Core™ processors will have you feeling immersed in gaming and entertainment like never before, whether at home or on the go.

Processor.Name: Intel Core i7-7700K Kaby Lake
Processor.Description: 7th Generation Intel® Core™ processors will have you feeling immersed in gaming and entertainment like never before, whether at home or on the go.

Processor.Name: Intel Core i9-7980XE Skylake
Processor.Description: Introducing Intel's most advanced 7th Generation Intel® Core™ desktop processor ever

RAM.Name: Corsair Vengeance LED DDR4 RAM
RAM.Description: Some of the best overall RAM on the market comes from Corsair. Their Vengeance series has something for everyone with its LED DDR4 offerings topping our list

RAM.Name: G.Skill Ripjaws V Series DDR4 RAM
RAM.Description: When looking for high-speed, quality DDR4 for your rig, look no further than the G.Skill Ripjaws V Series.

RAM.Name: Kingston HyperX Predator DDR3 RAM
RAM.Description: Kingston’s high-performance HyperX has some of the best DDR3 RAM on the market and the Predator models is particularly tuned for and extreme-performance that’s further expandable with XMP profiles.

Accessory.Name: Laptop Cooling Pad
Accessory.Description: Are you annoyed by your laptop's heat? Get a new cooling pad and your laptop will run as cool as ice.

Accessory.Name: Laptop Case
Accessory.Description: Protect your laptop from dust while carrying outside.

Accessory.Name: Bag
Accessory.Description: A durable and spacious laptop bag can help you carry your laptop with ease.
